Material used.Description: Neuroblastoma cell lines transfected with wild-type or mutant alpha-synuclein (A30P or A53T).

Readout description.Result Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein caused downregulation of genes (e.g., SNCA, PARK2), while A30P/A53T mutants did not.
Wild-type alpha-synuclein caused downregulation of genes (e.g., SNCA, PARK2), while A30P/A53T mutants did not.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Expression levels within baseline range (custom standard).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Expression levels deviating from baseline by ≥20% (custom standard).
